title: Equipping your Kids to Handle Money, Part 10
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: Giving your kid a credit card and teaching him or her to have a credit score, might not be the best way to go. John and Danny explain that there's always a way to buy necessities without going into debt.
description: Giving your kid a credit card and teaching him or her to have a credit score, might not be the best way to go. John and Danny explain that there's always a way to buy necessities without going into debt.
